answers.answer: Hi, this could be myositis, neuropathy, due to hypokalemia, sciatica, meralgia paraesthetica etc. Please consult doctor to rule out these causes. Are you on some medications? How old are you and any history of diabetes?

question: What could possibly cause me to have severe stabbing pains in my quad muscles? This happens several times during the day and sometimes during the night. When I am walking and this pain starts to occur, I have to quit walking because I nearly fall from the amount of pain.
title: Stabbing pains around quad muscles
